players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the villager.
Night 1 begins.
Diana was found dead.
Day 1 begins.
Charlie: "I investigated Bob last night. He is mafia. We must vote him out today."
Bob: "Charlie is lying to save himself or confuse us. I’m innocent and it’s suspicious he accuses me so quickly."
You: "Charlie, if you're the detective, why did you investigate Bob first instead of Diana? That seems odd."
You: "Charlie, if you're the detective, why did you investigate Bob first instead of Diana? That seems odd."
Bob: "Charlie is trying to frame me because he's scared. Alice, your question is a distraction—focus on the real threat here instead of confusing us with baseless doubts."
Charlie: "I investigated Bob because Diana was a likely first kill target. My info is solid. Alice, trust me. Bob is mafia."
Votes: Alice voted for Bob, Bob voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Bob
Bob was arrested
